events.name: North Korean ballistic missile launch
events.wd_description: North Korea launched a ballistic missile from the Sunan airport, aiming to achieve nuclear arsenal dominance as fast as possible.
events.description: North Korea launched a ballistic missile from the Sunan airport, aiming to achieve nuclear arsenal dominance as fast as possible.

events.name: Missile launch
events.wd_description: The missile was traced to the ocean of North Korea’s east coast, confirmed by the Japanese Ministry of Defence.
events.description: The missile was traced to the ocean of North Korea’s east coast, confirmed by the Japanese Ministry of Defence.

events.name: Regional response
events.wd_description: South Korea and Japan attested to the launch, with South Korea's President Yoon Suk-yeol promising a strong military alliance with the United States.
events.description: South Korea and Japan attested to the launch, with South Korea's President Yoon Suk-yeol promising a strong military alliance with the United States.

events.name: Public session on Pacific weather patterns, June 2022
events.wd_label: Public session on Pacific weather patterns, June 2022
events.wd_description: US-based scientist Dr. Mike McPhaden held a public session in Sydney to discuss the current state of the Pacific, focusing on the potential for a rare triple La Niña event and its implications for Australia’s weather.
events.description: US-based scientist Dr. Mike McPhaden held a public session in Sydney to discuss the current state of the Pacific, focusing on the potential for a rare triple La Niña event and its implications for Australia’s weather.

events.name: Discussion on El Niño and La Niña
events.wd_label: Discussion on El Niño and La Niña
events.wd_description: The session covered the significance of surface temperatures in the Nino 3.4 region of the tropical Pacific Ocean in determining the occurrence of El Niño or La Niña events.
events.description: The session covered the significance of surface temperatures in the Nino 3.4 region of the tropical Pacific Ocean in determining the occurrence of El Niño or La Niña events.

events.name: Potential triple La Niña
events.wd_description: Dr. McPhaden highlighted the rarity of a triple La Niña, which could continue into 2023, bringing increased rainfall and lower temperatures to Australia’s east coast.
events.description: Dr. McPhaden highlighted the rarity of a triple La Niña, which could continue into 2023, bringing increased rainfall and lower temperatures to Australia’s east coast.

events.name: Role of global heating in weather events
events.wd_label: Role of global heating in weather events
events.wd_description: The session also touched on the potential influence of global heating on the current and future weather events, though scientists are still studying its impact on storm activities.
events.description: The session also touched on the potential influence of global heating on the current and future weather events, though scientists are still studying its impact on storm activities.

events.name: Ukraine's EU candidate status recommendation
events.wd_description: Ukraine's bid to join the European Union received a boost as the European Commission recommended the country for candidate status due to Russia's invasion.
events.description: Ukraine's bid to join the European Union received a boost as the European Commission recommended the country for candidate status due to Russia's invasion.

events.name: European Commission recommendation
events.wd_description: The European Commission President, Ursula von der Leyen, announced the recommendation for Ukraine to be given candidate status, contingent on further reforms.
events.description: The European Commission President, Ursula von der Leyen, announced the recommendation for Ukraine to be given candidate status, contingent on further reforms.

events.name: Moldova's candidate status
events.wd_description: The commission also recommended candidate status for Ukraine's neighbor, Moldova.
events.description: The commission also recommended candidate status for Ukraine's neighbor, Moldova.

events.name: Upcoming EU summit
events.wd_description: Leaders of the 27 EU member states are set to meet for a summit next week to discuss their options.
events.description: Leaders of the 27 EU member states are set to meet for a summit next week to discuss their options.

events.name: Zelensky's statement
events.wd_description: Volodymyr Zelensky stated at a press conference that Russia's attack on Ukraine amounted to an attack on all of Europe. The German Chancellor, French President, and Italian Prime Minister were present at the conference.
events.description: Volodymyr Zelensky stated at a press conference that Russia's attack on Ukraine amounted to an attack on all of Europe. The German Chancellor, French President, and Italian Prime Minister were present at the conference.

events.name: Supply chain challenges for Tesla and solar/storage developers
events.wd_label: Supply chain challenges for Tesla and solar/storage developers
events.wd_description: Tesla and solar/storage developers are facing supply chain challenges, including labor and equipment shortages, transportation backlogs, and soaring lithium prices, resulting in delayed and canceled projects.
events.description: Tesla and solar/storage developers are facing supply chain challenges, including labor and equipment shortages, transportation backlogs, and soaring lithium prices, resulting in delayed and canceled projects.

events.name: Impact on Tesla
events.wd_description: Tesla is diversifying battery chemistries, with nearly half of its Q1 vehicles using lithium iron phosphate batteries. Energy storage deployments reached 846 MWh, a 90% year-over-year increase, but supply chain challenges have limited growth.
events.description: Tesla is diversifying battery chemistries, with nearly half of its Q1 vehicles using lithium iron phosphate batteries. Energy storage deployments reached 846 MWh, a 90% year-over-year increase, but supply chain challenges have limited growth.

events.name: Impact on solar deployments
events.wd_description: Solar deployments in the U.S. didn't meet 2021 expectations due to supply chain challenges, resulting in delayed gigawatts' worth of projects.
events.description: Solar deployments in the U.S. didn't meet 2021 expectations due to supply chain challenges, resulting in delayed gigawatts' worth of projects.

events.name: Lithium as a limiting factor
events.wd_description: Elon Musk highlighted lithium mining and refining as key limiting factors for accelerating sustainable energy, noting that while lithium is abundant, its refinement requires extensive industrial equipment.
events.description: Elon Musk highlighted lithium mining and refining as key limiting factors for accelerating sustainable energy, noting that while lithium is abundant, its refinement requires extensive industrial equipment.

events.name: Encouragement for entrepreneurs
events.wd_description: Musk encouraged entrepreneurs to enter the lithium space, suggesting significant profit potential in lithium refining.
events.description: Musk encouraged entrepreneurs to enter the lithium space, suggesting significant profit potential in lithium refining.

events.name: Temporary lithium price issue
events.wd_description: Morten Lund from Stoel Rives compared the current lithium price issue to past silicon shortages in the solar industry, predicting a temporary issue that will resolve as more facilities are built.
events.description: Morten Lund from Stoel Rives compared the current lithium price issue to past silicon shortages in the solar industry, predicting a temporary issue that will resolve as more facilities are built.

events.name: Future lithium investments
events.wd_description: Lund anticipated a "gold rush" for lithium investments, leading to lower prices and spurring further development of batteries and EVs.
events.description: Lund anticipated a "gold rush" for lithium investments, leading to lower prices and spurring further development of batteries and EVs.
